entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
